title: Tickets for Selena Gomez Presale: BuyCheapTicketsToEvents.com Announces Cheap Tickets for Selena Gomez’s 2016 Revival Tour
text:
October 13, 2015 at 02:30 AM EDT Tickets for Selena Gomez Presale: BuyCheapTicketsToEvents.com Announces Cheap Tickets for Selena Gomez’s 2016 Revival Tour Tickets for Selena Gomez Presale at BuyCheapTicketsToEvents.com 2016 tickets for Selena Gomez become available on a presale basis on October 13. The public will have their chance to secure seats on October 17. BuyCheapTicketsToEvents.com is delighting fans with cheap tickets for Selena Gomez for all stops on her epic 2016 Revival Tour. 
The “Revival Tour” begins its first leg next year on May 6 in Las Vegas and continues throughout the U.S. and Canada until July 8 when it concludes at Staples Center in Los Angeles. The tour is promoting the singer’s album by the same name that will be released on Friday, October 9. 
Visit BuyCheapTicketsToEvents.com to view the selection of Selena Goemz tickets at discount prices. 
Some of the locations within North America where the talented performer intends to make stops include Sacramento, Seattle, Saskatoon, Edmonton, Toronto, Montreal, Ottawa, Brooklyn, Newark, Atlanta, Miami, New Orleans, Louisville, Chicago, Minneapolis, Denver, Phoenix and San Diego. 
Tickets for Selena Gomez presale will pop up on October 13 and are expected to sell out to fans who can take advantage of the chance to beat the rush for concert seats by obtaining tickets early. Those music buffs who cannot use the early bird option need only wait until October 17 for their chance to obtain cheap tickets for Selena Gomez. 
The singing superstar has mentioned that she is eager to get back on the road again. She is looking forward to seeing her fans and performing new material from her latest album release. Her fans are just as eager to obtain her “Revival” album and enjoy the new songs featured on it through a live performance next year. 
High ticket sales are anticipated for 2016 “Revival” performances. Entertainment venues in the 41 cities where the young star will travel during the first leg of her tour are expected to book solid. Her loyal followers will be wise to obtain tickets for Selena Gomez presale on October 13 or during public onsales starting October 17. 
With a new release coming out this year and a promotional tour taking place next year, the talented entertainer is definitely keeping busy to the delight of her many fans. The “Revival Tour” will be a hugely successful journey for the “Wizards of Waverly Place” star, and fans will snatch up concert tickets in record numbers. 
BuyCheapTicketsToEvents.com is providing cheap tickets for Selena Gomez that concertgoers will be able to purchase securely, quickly and easily through the reputable ticket exchange. Thrifty music fans can save money on seats with lower prices.
